Class ApplicantInterface

java.lang.Object
bto.Boundaries.ApplicantInterface
public class ApplicantInterface extends Object
User interface for applicants in the BTO system.

This class handles all interaction with applicants, providing a console interface for viewing projects, submitting applications, managing enquiries, viewing application status, and other applicant-specific operations.
